Goatfest

1
Kaldonis
Saturday, November 25th, 2017, 9:16:31 AM

Join Beacon Hall Archive as we celebrate the Goat Days Festival! A time-honored tradition in River’s Rest, the fest will include competitions, historical tours, challenging games, and several raffles that will be held over the course of three evenings.

Date: Saturday, November 25, 2017

Title: Xojium robe raffle Time: 1:45 PM EST Location: River’s Rest, Commons Circle (east) Details: Raffle for unlocked Xojium robes: “some ivory scholarly robes highlighted with a scrolling crimson motif”. Tickets are 100k each.

Title: Goat Stories Time: 2:00 PM EST Location: Beacon Hall Courtyard Host: Jersea Details: Come hear the history of Goat Fest and Citadel zoo tour. Join us for the formal opening of Goatfest 5117 starting at the Beacon Hall Courtyard.

Title: Ensorcell Raffle Time: 6:45 PM EST Location: River’s Rest, Commons Circle (south) Details: Raffle of up to tier 5 ensorcell power. Tickets are 100k each. The winner should contact Kaldonis.

Title: Goat Fashion Show Time: 7:00 PM EST Location: Beacon Hall Coutryard Host: Kaldonis Details: Bring your fanciest goat to gloat! There’s no better place for your goat to be a show boat. Drag your goat to Beacon Hall’s Courtyard for this year’s Goat Fashion Show. (OOC Note: Entries should be made using roleplaying verbs such as ACTION etc.)

Date: Sunday, November 26, 2017

Title: 7x Runestaff Raffle Time: 1:45 PM EST Location: River’s Rest, Commons Circle (west) Details: Raffle for 7x (+32) sanctified fireleaf runestaff. Tickets are 100k. (Alteration to a shepherd’s crook is pending.)

Title: Greedy Goatherd Time: 2:00 PM EST Location: Beacon Hall Courtyard Host: Fyonn Details: Here’s a chance to show off your shepherding skills. Take risks and build your flock as fast as you can, but watch out! If you get too greedy and you might lose them all. Join us at the Beacon Hall Courtyard for a fast-paced dice game.

Title: Merchant Time Raffle Time: 3:45 PM EST Location: River’s Rest, River Road (by the drawbridge) Details: Raffle for 15 minutes of merchant time for four (4) winners. Tickets are 100k each. (OOC Note: Winner should make arrangements with GM Elidi.)

Title: Dance to the Bleat Time: 4:00 PM EST Location: Beacon Hall Terrace Host: Astru Details: Come show off your finest goatfest attire as you dance to the bleat! Join us at the Beacon Hall terrace for a good time! Just follow the goat prints.

Date: Monday, November 27th, 2017

Title: Gem of Fate Time: 6:00 PM EST Location: Beacon Hall Courtyard Host: Kaldonis Details: Dodge the most of these shocking gems and the remainder of these sparkly rocks can be yours! Players should gather in the Beacon Hall Courtyard, while spectators as well as losers may safely observe the maiming of their comrades from the Gazebo.

Title: Beacon Hall’s Annual Fishing Tournament Time: 9:00 PM EST Location: Floating Dock, Tempest River Host: Fyrentennimar Details: Join us for this year’s Goatfest Fishing Tournament. Bring your own fishing gear or use some of ours. Join us at the Floating Dock on the Tempest River for fishing along with snacks and drinks. Whoever catches the biggest fish within an hour wins!

Title: Goat Pin Raffle Time: 10:15 PM EST Location: River’s Rest, Town Commons Details: Raffle for a goat pin which can eat anything: “a miniature rampant void blue scaled dragon pin”. Tickets are 100k each.
